context: As I read this article,  I kept thinking about Amazon and the US Postal Service.
And so begins the end.  Until Micheal Biehn takes on Arnold Schwarzenegger, a living machine...
Easier just to implant tracking devices on Dems, Libbies and Islamic Terrorists.
